title: User Registration and Authentication
description: As a new user, I want to register for the tool library and login securely so that I can access the platform
acceptanceCriteria: AC01: Given a new user, when they visit the registration page, they should see a form requesting email, phone, postcode, and password
AC02: Given a registration form, when all required fields are filled correctly, then the user account should be created and they should be logged in automatically
AC03: Given invalid registration data, when submitted, then appropriate error messages should be displayed
AC04: Given a registered user, when they visit the login page, they should see a form requesting email and password
AC05: Given valid login credentials, when submitted, then the user should be logged in and receive an OAuth token
AC06: Given invalid login credentials, when submitted, then an appropriate error message should be displayed
AC07: Given a logged-in user, when they click logout, then they should be logged out and the token invalidated
